measure.description: WDCC Conformance and Subjective Controls: Automated technical quality checks of data subjective data and metadata controls
measure.name: CMIP5 Quality Control Data Level 2

evaluation.description:
evaluationMethodType=indirect

Quality Control Levels in CMIP5:
* Level 0: Spot checks on selected data
* Level 1: CMOR2 and ESG publisher conformance checks
* Level 2: Data consistency checks
* Level 3: Double- and cross-checks of data and metadata and data publication as DataCite DOI

Level 2
1. File consistency 
 a. in the end files will have the right number of records. The number is given in the metadata.
 b. strictly regular time steps (ESG checker allows for time gaps)
 c. Metadata consistency (check of consistency between metadata of the standard_output table and the metadata of the file headers)

2. Physical properties of variables 
 time series are calculated for: min, max, globally weighted mean (in case of no _FillValue), area weighted mean (in case of existing _FillValue; reasonable, e.g., for temperature of snow), standard deviation of the globally weighted mean.
evaluation.explanation:
Quality Control results are accessible at: http://cera-www.dkrz.de/WDCC/CMIP5/QCResult.jsp?experiment=cmip5/output1/MPI-M/MPI-ESM-MR/amipFuture . nc files are the QC result files for every variable, the log file summarizes the QC results for this experiment. If available, the pdf file visualizes the global timeseries for statistical values and an error code for every variable of the experiment, relying on the QC result files. 
Used version of checker tool: "QC Tool in svn revision: 4782 by author: heinz-dieter on date: 2012-07-18 14:18:56 +0200 (Wed, 18 Jul 2012)".
 
QC Level2 assigned at 2013-07-08 07:13:11 UTC: No errors reported by QC2 tool for v20121106: cfMIP data was not delivered; QC restart (2013-04-17 11:13:21 UTC); QC Level set to QCL2_started (2013-04-17 11:03:10 UTC): cfMIP data was promised and in the meantime a new dataset version was published; QC Level2 assigned at 2012-09-07 06:28:38 UTC: confirmed for v20120713 by Stephanie Legutke (06.09.2012)
evaluation.specification: The CMIP5/AR5 Model Data Quality Control

evaluation.description:
evaluationMethodType=indirect

Quality Control Levels in CMIP5:
 * Level 0: Spot checks on selected data
 * Level 1: CMOR2 and ESG publisher conformance checks
 * Level 2: Data consistency checks
 * Level 3: Double- and cross-checks of data and metadata and data publication as DataCite DOI
 
Level 3 / DataCite DOI Data Publication
1. Technical Quality Assurance
 a. metadata consistency check (TDS, CIM, CERA2)
 b. data accessiblitiy at CMIP5 gateways at PCMDI, BADC, DKRZ
2. Scientific Quality Assurance
 Documantation of method and results of quality checks performed by data creator
3. Data Publication
 a. assignment of unique identifier DOI via DataCite API
 b. metadata persistence
 c. data persistence accessiblility via DOI resolver
evaluation.explanation:
The quality results for this ESG publication unit are part of the quality results for the related experiment: Quality control checks level 3 / DOI data publication according to DataCite regulations (http://datacite.org) for experiment "cmip5 output1 MPI-M MPI-ESM-MR amipFuture"

Quality specification:

[CMIP5:TQA=done according to criteria for QCL3 defined at http://redmine.dkrz.de/collaboration/projects/cmip5-qc/wiki/Qc_l3#Criteria-for-QC-L3DOI-publication ]
